metadata.title: DREAM USA Men's Fleece Cargo Shorts Heavyweight M-5XL
features: Two Cargo Pockets / One back Pocket
Seller : URBANJ - Please check the name of seller before purchasing the product.
description: Dream USA Fleece Cargo Shorts for Men Designed in Los Angeles, California Premium quality with heavy duty fabric and durable stitching Loose fit that's suitable for baggy styling and big and tall men Comfortable elastic waist band with adjustable drawstring Additional large, durable, convenient, and secure side pockets with Velcro closure 60% Cotton 40% Polyester Machine Wash Cold, Wash with Like Colors, Tumble Dry Low, Do Not Bleach Available in black, brown, charcoal, gold, heather gray, kelly green, navy, orange, pink, purple, red, royal, sky blue, wheat, white, and yellow Size/waist Measurement - M(32-34") L(36-38") XL(40-42") 2XL(44-46") 3XL(48-50") 4XL(52-54") 5XL(56-58")
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Item model number": "DFP-1", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "October 13, 2016"}
